short_summary: Qualification: Suppliers may participate as new or existing suppliers. Arrangements must only be submitted through Canada Buys. Services include sequencing, genomics and shotgun metagenomics.
description: Supply arrangement for sequencing services for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: 01R11-231050 Sequencing Services - RFSA

## Details

* Project Title: Sequencing Services - RFSA
* Reference Number: WS4038319748-Doc4042973312
* Amendment Number: 4
* Government Solicitation Number: WS4038319748
* Publication Date: 2023-09-27
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-05-10T14:00:00

## Contract Highlights

* Contract Category: SRV (Service)
* Tender Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2028-03-31
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Notice Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17567554?extsite=MTc1Njc1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* End User Entities Name: Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* End User Entities Address: K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave,Ottawa,Ontario,K1Y4X2,Canada

## Contract Description

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking qualified Suppliers for sequencing services on as-and-when requested basis. Services include receipt of samples, library construction and quality control, next generation sequencing, DNA and RNA sequencing, genomics and shotgun metagenomics and metatranscriptomics, high throughput sequencing, data analysis, recording, and safekeeping and disposal of samples. The period of the supply arrangement (SA) will be from issuance to 31 March 2028.

## Trade Agreements

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CU
